```{r setup, include=FALSE, layout = "l-body-outset"}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggthemes)
library(knitr)
library(rmarkdown)
library(gt)
```

```{r}
raw_data <- read_csv(file="owid-covid-data.csv")
raw_data
clean_data1 <- raw_data %>% 
  select(total_cases, human_development_index) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(total_cases,human_development_index))  +
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth(method="lm",formula=y~x, se=FALSE)+
  theme_clean()+
  labs(title="Fuel Effieciency and Weight", subtitle="Heavier cars are less fuel efficient",x="Weight",y="MPG")
clean_data1
```


```{r Covid-plot}

clean_data <-raw_data %>% 
  select(continent, total_cases) %>% 
  drop_na() %>% 
  group_by(continent) %>% 
  summarize(continent_cases=sum(total_cases)) 
clean_data %>% 
  ggplot(mapping=aes(x=continent,y=continent_cases,fill=continent))+
  geom_col()+
  scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::number_format())+
  labs(title="Covid Cases per Continent",subtitle="Developed and Populated Continents with Higher Cases", x="Continent",y="Continent Cases",fill="Continents")
clean_data

```
